name: Century Park Motor Lodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My wife and I travelled with a friend of ours to Nelson for the arts festival.
reviews.title: Dont judge a book by its cover

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: And when the taxi pulled up at the front I was concerned that this would be one of those cookie cutter motels - same as everywhere else, no class, boring. There is nothing wrong with that at all.
reviews.title: Superb Motel with Excellent Hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: But I was surprised. From the moment we walked into reception we were greeted by Jan, smiling away and ready to help us with any query. We were treated royaly. The Presidential room was fab - lovely fire, spa bath, gorgeous rooms.
reviews.title: Superb amenities and service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Was a 10 minute stroll into the top of the shopping area, so well located
reviews.title: Surprise package

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I guess the best positive I could say is should I be going to nelson I will be looking to staying here first.
reviews.title: Excellent accommodation in Nelson

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this motel through the town's i-site and were not disappointed. The room was well-appointed, modern and clean, with a large ensuite bathroom. The owners were helpful and friendly. Central location but no views (didn't really bother us as we were only there for one night before moving on).
reviews.title: Good place for a overnight stop

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012
reviews.text: Stayed 1 night after walking the Abel Tasman. Friendly helpful hosts. Heat pumps & free wifi appreciated.
reviews.title: Great service and amenities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Recently voted 21st best in it's class in the world, and it deservs it. Don't look any further, if place has a vacancy, go for it. Best value for money in NZ.
reviews.title: This will take some Beating

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Best service we experienced in NZ throughout our one month holiday. The Presidential suite was lovely, very clean, comfortable and modern. We were treated like friends from the moment we arrived and spoiled with thoughtful gestures, free use of the DVD library and spot on recommendations for activities and restaurants. The complimentary use of bicycles for biking around Nelson was a bonus. We highly recommend this establishment for anyone wanting a touch of class, luxury and comfort and service that is hard to beat.
reviews.title: Welcoming, comfortable and professional service of a very high standard.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012
reviews.text: Thank you Jan and Century Park family.
reviews.title: Best accommodation of trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This motel was a cut above all the others we visited in our 2-weeks on the South Island, primarily because it is a fairly new property. Stayed here 2 nights before Abel Tasman hike and 1 night after, and had the same room for all 3 nights. Based on photos, we had one of the smaller rooms, but it was very modern and comfortable - high marks for FOUR LARGE FLUFFY BATH TOWELS for the two of us. Washer/dryer available for guests, with a nominal charge for use. Also computer in the lobby for convenience. Easy talkl into town. Helpful suggestions for restaurants and other activities.
reviews.title: A Cut Above

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: We only spent one night here but the quality is first class. Big bedroom and sitting room with all facilities and lovely bathroom. Good advice received from the owner on restaurants in the area.
reviews.title: Excellent stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the motor lodge for 3 nights (in downstairs studio room) before Abel Tasman walk and then one night afterwards (in exec spa studio room). Very impressed from time of booking. A list of suggested things to do in and around Nelson came back with the booking confirmation. Very friendly hosts on arrival. Rooms are modern and well equipped. Location is easy walk to the shops and restaurants.
reviews.title: Great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Super helpful and knowledgeable staff; modern, clean, comfortable, well-designed room; walking distance to the central shops and restaurants - we highly recommend this place and hope we get back to Nelson to stay there again!
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Nelson

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Century Park only one night while passing through Nelson. It’s a travelers’ choice winner for a reason. First of all, everyone at the front desk was very nice and helpful. They got us checked in right away and provided some great restaurant suggestions. The entire facility was well maintained and clean. The rooms were fantastic! They were modern, well decorated, and clean. They also contained a small kitchen with all the amenities needed for a great stay. If going to Nelson, I would most definitely recommend a stay there.
reviews.title: Great rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This motel offers a good standard of accommodation at a reasonable cost. We opted for a two room suite which was fully equipped and, importantly, offers a quiet night's rest.
reviews.title: Decent value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: This is despite the fact that the property is located on a main road into Nelson and shares the street with a fairly uninspiring collection of other motels and car sales lots.
reviews.title: Excellent!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a 10 minute stroll into Nelson centre where there is a large choice of bars and restaurants.
reviews.title: Small but very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Were we visiting Nelson again I would be inclined to try the centrally located Rutherfords Hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent !!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 4 nights in the twin shared room.The hotel is located only a few minutes walk from the centre of Nelson. The room was clean, fully stocked with everything we needed, including a dishwasher. The bathroom was spotless, with nice fluffy towels and lovely body wash. The owners were wonderful. They were friendly, welcoming and knowledgeable. We received some excellent recommendations for where to eat and what to do.We really enjoyed our stay at Century Park Motor Lodge and would happily recommend
reviews.title: Wedding Anniversary

description: One of Nelson's newest luxury accommodation right at the heart of the city. A fantastic team ready to welcome you and help with your vacation needs. The best beds available in New Zealand. Come along, we would love to meet you.
